itemDescription: Olympic lacrosse player of Great Britain

wikipedia_page.main: Reginald George Warren Martin (June 25, 1887 – January 29, 1981) was a British lacrosse player who competed in the 1908 Summer Olympics. He was part of the British team which won the silver medal.
